title: Book, early 19th century
description: Pattern Book for Kimonos. Fifty-four pages bound in a paper cover with white thread. Kimono patterns in inked outline. Over these various traditional Japanese designs scattered on the pages.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Gift of Rowland Burdon-Muller. 1939-17-8.
